articles.title: SPMC Chief Clarifies Mpox-HIV Remarks
articles.description: SPMC Chief clarifies Mpox-HIV remarks, stresses inclusive, data-based health messaging and commitment to RA 11166 anti-discrimination law.

articles.title: Armand Duplantis pole vault world record: Swedish star dazzles at Stockholm Diamond League
articles.description: Armand Duplantis breaks the men's pole vault record for a 12th time - but for the first time in Sweden - at the Stockholm Diamond League.
articles.content:
Armand Duplantis broke the men's pole vault world record for a 12th time with a clearance of 6.28m at the Diamond League meeting in Stockholm.
This one was extra special for the 25-year-old, however, as it was the first time he had improved the world... [947 chars]

articles.title: Trump says 'it's possible' US gets involved in Israel-Iran conflict
articles.description: President Donald Trump said Sunday that the U.S. is not involved in Israel's military strikes, but "it's possible we could get involved."
articles.content:
No U.S. involvement at this point, says Trump, who's open to Putin as mediator.

articles.title: Family pay tribute to ‘selfless’ woman after skydiving death in Devon
articles.description: Belinda Taylor described by son as someone who ‘wanted the best for others’ as partner seeks answers over incident
articles.content:
The son of Belinda Taylor, who died in a skydiving incident on Friday, has paid tribute to a “selfless woman who wanted only the best for others”, as her partner said he wanted answers over what went wrong.
